publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2352.1 Tommy Sheridan: Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2352) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "but, in so doing, supports the removal of private and other fee-paying schools from the artificial cover of charitable status which saves these elite institutions thousands of pounds in various taxes every year and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward amendments during Stage 2 of the Bill to achieve this objective whilst maintaining the status of independent special schools." Supported by: Colin Fox* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
